casebody.data:
Charles Pope CALDWELL and George E. POLHEMUS, Copartners, Doing Business under the Firm Name and Style of Caldwell & Polhemus. Plaintiffs in Error (Plaintiffs Below), v. George A. CARDEN, Defendant in Error (Defendant Below). (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 7, 1924.) No. 313. Ralpli E. Slayton, of New York City (Gordon S. P. Kleeberg an'd Jacob M. Rosenfeld, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiffs in error. Battle, Vandiver, Levy & Van Tine, of New York City (George Gordon Battle, Almuth C. Vandiver, and Ludlow S. Fowler, all of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
